original_title: NieR Music Concert 《人形達ノ記憶》
overview: Experience the music and world of NieR in a new way in the "The Memories of Puppets" concert! The acclaimed music of the game series, as well as scenario readings, was performed live in five sold-out concerts held in April and May 2017. This release records the final show of the concert series on May 5, 2017.
title: NieR Music Concert: The Memories of Puppets
